name: UfarmX
description: UfarmX is an AI-driven agri-fintech platform that provides farmers with collateral-free, input-based loans by analyzing geospatial and socioeconomic data. Our technology de-risks agricultural lending, enabling financial institutions to scale farmer financing while helping agribusinesses streamline procurement and market access.
one_liner: UfarmX is an AI-driven agri-fintech platform that provides farmers with collateral-free, input-based loans by analyzing geospatial and socioeconomic data. Our technology de-risks agricultural lending, enabling financial institutions to scale farmer financing while helping agribusinesses streamline procurement and market access.
